snippet: The group of 10 aid workers, with the group Partners in Health, may have come in contact with the virus in Sierra Leone, officials said.
abstract: Ten American aid workers who may have come into contact with Ebola virus in Sierra Leone are being sent back to United States for monitoring.
lead_paragraph: The group of 10 aid workers, with the group Partners in Health, may have come in contact with the virus in Sierra Leone, officials said.

headline.main: Americans Evacuated From Sierra Leone After Possible Ebola Contact
headline.print_headline: Americans Evacuated After Possible Ebola Contact
